{"id":839264964,"question_id":1666,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 4 months","timestamp":1667893038,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/839264964/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        int flag;\n        do{\n            flag = 0;\n            for(int i = 0; i < s.size() - 1; i++){\n                if(tolower(s[i]) == tolower(s[i+1]) && (islower(s[i]) ^ islower(s[i + 1]))){\n                    s.erase(s.begin() + i, s.begin() + i + 2);\n                    if(s.size() == 0) break;\n                    cout << s << endl;\n                    i--;\n                    flag = 1;\n                }\n            }\n        }while(flag);\n        return s;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
